function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation systems in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and other infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and testing of ventilation systems, installation of high-efficiency air filters, and increasing outside air flow rate","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, natural lytic enzyme modification, semi-absolute filters, PM2.5 filters, photocatalytic oxidation (PCO) filters","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Ineffective air filtration systems","Impact":"Inefficient removal of pathogens and viruses from indoor air","Mitigation":"Upgrading filtration grade, installation of high-efficiency air filters, regular maintenance, and testing of air filtration systems","Technologies":"HEPA filters, semi-absolute filters, PM2.5 filters, photocatalytic oxidation (PCO) filters","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Difficulty in retrofitting air filtration units with HVAC systems","Impact":"Limited ability to implement advanced air filtration technology in existing buildings","Mitigation":"Consideration of movable vertical air filtration units, consultation with HVAC experts, and investment in innovative retrofitting solutions","Technologies":"Movable vertical air filtration units, consultation with HVAC experts, innovative retrofitting solutions","People":"Building owners, maintenance teams, and HVAC experts","Owner":"Building owners"}]}
